description: Gets a response headers policy configuration. To get a response headers policy configuration, you must provide the policy's identifier. If the response headers policy is attached to a distribution's cache behavior, you can get the policy's identifier using ListDistributions or GetDistribution. If the response headers policy is not attached to a cache behavior, you can get the identifier using ListResponseHeadersPolicies.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier for the response headers policy. If the response headers policy is attached to a distribution's cache behavior, you can get the policy's identifier using ListDistributions or GetDistribution. If the response headers policy is not attached to a cache behavior, you can get the identifier using ListResponseHeadersPolicies.

nested_items.name: ResponseHeadersPolicyConfig
nested_items.description: Contains a response headers policy.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: A comment to describe the response headers policy.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A name to identify the response headers policy.

nested_items.name: CorsConfig
nested_items.description: A configuration for a set of HTTP response headers that are used for cross-origin resource sharing (CORS).

nested_items.name: AccessControlAllowOrigins
nested_items.description: A list of origins (domain names) that CloudFront can use as the value for the Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of origins in the list.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of origins (domain names). You can specify * to allow all origins.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AccessControlAllowHeaders
nested_items.description: A list of HTTP header names that CloudFront includes as values for the Access-Control-Allow-Headers HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of HTTP header names in the list.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of HTTP header names. You can specify * to allow all headers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AccessControlAllowMethods
nested_items.description: A list of HTTP methods that CloudFront includes as values for the Access-Control-Allow-Methods HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of HTTP methods in the list.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of HTTP methods. Valid values are:
GET.
DELETE.
HEAD.
OPTIONS.
PATCH.
POST.
PUT.
ALL.

nested_items.name: AccessControlAllowCredentials
nested_items.description: A Boolean that CloudFront uses as the value for the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: AccessControlExposeHeaders
nested_items.description: A list of HTTP headers that CloudFront includes as values for the Access-Control-Expose-Headers HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of HTTP headers in the list.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of HTTP headers. You can specify * to expose all headers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AccessControlMaxAgeSec
nested_items.description: A number that CloudFront uses as the value for the Access-Control-Max-Age HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: OriginOverride
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides HTTP response headers received from the origin with the ones specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: SecurityHeadersConfig
nested_items.description: A configuration for a set of security-related HTTP response headers.

nested_items.name: XSSProtection
nested_items.description: Determines whether CloudFront includes the X-XSS-Protection HTTP response header and the header's value.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides the X-XSS-Protection HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: Protection
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines the value of the X-XSS-Protection HTTP response header. When this setting is true, the value of the X-XSS-Protection header is 1. When this setting is false, the value of the X-XSS-Protection header is 0.

nested_items.name: ModeBlock
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront includes the mode=block directive in the X-XSS-Protection header.

nested_items.name: ReportUri
nested_items.description: A reporting URI, which CloudFront uses as the value of the report directive in the X-XSS-Protection header.

nested_items.name: FrameOptions
nested_items.description: Determines whether CloudFront includes the X-Frame-Options HTTP response header and the header's value.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides the X-Frame-Options HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: FrameOption
nested_items.description: The value of the X-Frame-Options HTTP response header. Valid values are DENY and SAMEORIGIN.

nested_items.name: ReferrerPolicy
nested_items.description: Determines whether CloudFront includes the Referrer-Policy HTTP response header and the header's value.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides the Referrer-Policy HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: ReferrerPolicy
nested_items.description: The value of the Referrer-Policy HTTP response header. Valid values are:
no-referrer.
no-referrer-when-downgrade.
origin.
origin-when-cross-origin.
same-origin.
strict-origin.
strict-origin-when-cross-origin.
unsafe-url.

nested_items.name: ContentSecurityPolicy
nested_items.description: The policy directives and their values that CloudFront includes as values for the Content-Security-Policy HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides the Content-Security-Policy HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: ContentSecurityPolicy
nested_items.description: The policy directives and their values that CloudFront includes as values for the Content-Security-Policy HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: ContentTypeOptions
nested_items.description: Determines whether CloudFront includes the X-Content-Type-Options HTTP response header with its value set to nosniff.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides the X-Content-Type-Options HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: StrictTransportSecurity
nested_items.description: Determines whether CloudFront includes the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP response header and the header's value.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: IncludeSubdomains
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront includes the includeSubDomains directive in the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Preload
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront includes the preload directive in the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: AccessControlMaxAgeSec
nested_items.description: A number that CloudFront uses as the value for the max-age directive in the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: ServerTimingHeadersConfig
nested_items.description: A configuration for enabling the Server-Timing header in HTTP responses sent from CloudFront.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront adds the Server-Timing header to HTTP responses that it sends in response to requests that match a cache behavior that's associated with this response headers policy.

nested_items.name: SamplingRate
nested_items.description: A number 0---100 (inclusive) that specifies the percentage of responses that you want CloudFront to add the Server-Timing header to. When you set the sampling rate to 100, CloudFront adds the Server-Timing header to the HTTP response for every request that matches the cache behavior that this response headers policy is attached to. When you set it to 50, CloudFront adds the header to 50% of the responses for requests that match the cache behavior. You can set the sampling rate to any number 0---100 with up to four decimal places.

nested_items.name: CustomHeadersConfig
nested_items.description: A configuration for a set of custom HTTP response headers.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of HTTP response headers in the list.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of HTTP response headers and their values.

nested_items.name: Header
nested_items.description: The HTTP response header name.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the HTTP response header.

nested_items.name: Override
nested_items.description: A Boolean that determines whether CloudFront overrides a response header with the same name received from the origin with the header specified here.

nested_items.name: RemoveHeadersConfig
nested_items.description: A configuration for a set of HTTP headers to remove from the HTTP response.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The number of HTTP header names in the list.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of HTTP header names.

nested_items.name: Header
nested_items.description: The HTTP header name.

nested_items.name: ETag
nested_items.description: The version identifier for the current version of the response headers policy.
